## DateFieldDefinition type

Represents a date field definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DateFieldDefinition = ItemPublishableFieldDefinition & {
    DefaultValue?: string;
    IsMaxValueExclusive?: boolean;
    IsMinValueExclusive?: boolean;
    List?: DateListDefinition;
    MaxValue?: string;
    MinValue?: string;
    Pattern?: string;
};
```
